SELECT HSHY_RESOURCE.TITLE AS TITLE , CJXJ.SRC_NAME AS SRCNAME , HSHY_RESOURCE.PUBDATE AS PUBDATE , HSHY_RESOURCE.LINKURL AS LINKURL, HSHY_RESOURCE.DESCRIPTCONTEXT,HSHY_RESOURCE.IMAGEURL AS IMAGEURL FROM HSHY_RESOURCE_DETAIL_TABLE HSHY_RESOURCE , CJXJ_RESOURCE_TABLE CJXJ WHERE 1=1 AND HSHY_RESOURCE.ID = #{id} AND CJXJ.ID = HSHY_RESOURCE.ID ORDER BY HSHY_RESOURCE.PUBDATE DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
